official_title: A bill to establish a laboratory for research on the effects of the loss of wintering habitat of migratory waterfowl.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Director of the United States Fish and Wildlife Service, to establish and operate a laboratory for the continuous research of the effects of the loss of coastal and inland wintering habitat of migratory waterfowl. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1986.

titles.title: A bill to establish a laboratory for research on the effects of the loss of wintering habitat of migratory waterfowl.
